changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table food_type ( id varchar(30) not null primary key, name varchar(30) not null, description varchar(100) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table food_list ( id varchar(30) not null primary key, name varchar(100) not null, type varchar(255) not null, foreign key(type) references food_type(id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table food_schedule ( id varchar(30) not null, data date not null, food_id varchar(30) not null, primary key(data, food_id), foreign key(food_id) references food_list(id) )
